reference.title: javaVolatileField
reference.shortdesc: The <javaVolatileField> element provides a flag within the FieldModifiersopt that declares the fields that are introduced by the declaration can be declared volatile.

refbody.section: DescriptionThe volatile fields are special fields that are used for communicating a state between threads. Possible alternative definitions of the FieldModifier declaration are the <javaStaticField>, <javaTransientField>, and <javaFinalField> elements. The <javaSynchronizedMethod> element has the following predefined attributes: name ="volatile" and value ="volatile"..
